thread.title: Kim Jong Un secretly met with China's Xi Jinping

title: Kim Jong Un secretly met with China's Xi Jinping
text:
Kim Jong Un secretly met with China's Xi Jinping 6:31pm IST - 01:23 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un pledges to denuclearize and meet U.S. officials at a historic meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping, at Kim's first known trip outside North Korea since assuming power in 2011. Ryan Brooks reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un pledges to denuclearize and meet U.S. officials at a historic meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping, at Kim's first known trip outside North Korea since assuming power in 2011.
